title: India Adds 14 Million Manufacturing Jobs Since 2018; A Third Comes From Custom Tailoring
description: Nearly two out of every five new manufacturing jobs created since 2018 were taken up by custom tailors between 2018 and 2024, according to data.
content:
Last Updated:December 05, 2025, 16:00 IST
India added an estimated 14 million new manufacturing jobs between 2018 and 2024, amid a post-pandemic recovery and rising informal-sector participation. Re… [+2425 chars]
